sentence.text: We evaluated the molecular heterogeneity of sCRC tumors based on simultaneous assessment of the overall regulation of TOR signaling of both coding mRNA and non-coding RNA genes in primary sCRC tumor samples from 23 consecutive patients and their paired liver metastases.

RHOA, transforming growth factor beta receptor signaling pathway, transforming growth factor beta receptor signaling pathway, embryonic pattern specification, negative regulation of SMAD protein complex assembly, protein phosphorylation, negative regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II and negative regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II-, which thereby emerge as candidate genes to play an important role in CRC tumor metastasis

entity.text: transforming growth factor beta receptor signaling pathway
